2068840.name: Hellopoly
2068840.description:
Hellopoly is a challenging, narrative-driven adventure platformer: climb high-height locations with the use of your directional charge jump while discovering an exciting original narrative along the way!

What it's about:

You've been hired (kidnapped) by the Devil of Hell, Mr. Business, to resolve a critical production issue that could make or break the business. Enter into the fast-paced work environment of Hell, meet your new demon co-workers (they hate you), and uncover their dark secrets before your soul is lost forever.

What it's got:

  • Various challenging locations to climb, each with unique characters, obstacles, and scenery

  • A multitude of dynamic movement options, including directional charge jumping, running, sliding, air floating, fast falling, wall bouncing, and more!

  • A charming, character-driven story full of heart and laughs

  • A vibrant world with tons of interesting characters to chat with, exciting places to explore, and secrets waiting to be found

  • A boldly ugly main character

Will you escape this HELLISH startup alive? No, but hey, that's just BUSINESS!
